CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: .30 Carabine FMJ
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Standard Full Metal Jacket ammo, more powerful tan pistol round but not enought to be an intermediate catridge.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: .30 Carabine HP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Hollow Point ammo, improved damage counter soft target with less armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: .45-70 Govt FMJ
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Standard Full Metal Jacket/Ball ammo, a black powder round, improvement and a replacement of the previous ammo.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: .45-70 Govt JHP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Modern Jacket Hollow Point ammo, very powerful round counter soft target but lacks penetration, very effective for Big Game Hunting.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: .45-70 Govt Forage
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: "Forage" ammo, snake shot/rat shot, a hunting round designed to hunt small animals in close range, not very effective counter anything bigger.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 23mm KS Buckshot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size buckshot round filled with few not-so-small metallic pellets, very lethal for close range combat.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 23mm KS Slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size slug round with single steel core penetrator, can knock out a car engine in medium range.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 23mm KS Star
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size flashbang round, a less-than-lethal round, not very effective beyond close range.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 23mm KS Explosive
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size buckshot round filled with few explosive pellets, very lethal for close range combat and effective for breaching.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 23mm KS BeanBag
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size beanbag round with single rubber/plastic projectile, a less-than-lethal round, not very effective counter armored target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 23mm KS Explosive EMP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Large size electro-slug round with mini EMP core, cause small EMP blast and stun/paralize any mechanical part.
